column6:
When I connect the headphones to my laptop (or any other device) using the USB cable, I do not get any sound output.
However, I have found that if I hold the USB cable very tightly at the connection point, the sound will start to work. This indicates a likely connection issue with the USB cable or the port on the headphones themselves.
I have tested these headphones on multiple devices and encountered the same problem, confirming that the issue is with the headphones or the cable, and not the devices I'm connecting to.

column6:
Subject: Complaint Regarding Malfunctioning Kreo Swarm Keyboard

Dear Kreo Support Team,

I purchased a Kreo Swarm keyboard on October 26, and within just three months of use, it has started experiencing several issues. Specifically, the "B" and "H" keys and many other keys like W A S D which gives different output with every click and frequently double-register, causing unintended inputs. Additionally, there is noticeable input lag, which significantly affects my typing and gaming experience.

Given that this issue has arisen so soon after purchase, I am highly disappointed with the product's reliability. I would appreciate a replacement or repair under warranty at the earliest convenience. Please advise on the next steps to resolve this matter.

Looking forward to your prompt response.

Best regards,
Digvijay Wagh.

column5: Kreo Gaming Wired Mouse (Black) (HSN-84716060)
column6:
I’m having a serious problem with my mouse. It keeps clicking automatically without me pressing any buttons. Whenever I move the cursor over a file or application, it opens by itself as if I double-clicked it—even though I didn’t touch any buttons at all.

This happens constantly, making it almost impossible to use the computer properly. I can’t even hover over icons or navigate through files without something opening on its own. It’s also triggered random actions like dragging files, selecting text, or opening settings windows. I tried restarting the system, checking the mouse settings, and even plugging the mouse into a different USB port, but the issue persists.

It feels like the mouse is “stuck” in a clicking state, or like it’s registering every hover as a click. This is extremely frustrating and disruptive, especially when trying to do any kind of work.

column5: Kreo Hive Wired Full Size RGB Backlight Gaming Mechanical Keyboard, Customizable RGB, Mechanical Switches, NKRO, Metal Volume Knob, All White Keycaps (All White, Red Switch) | B0D816J2BL ( B0D816J2BL ) HSN:84716060
column6: Kreo Support Team, I am writing to follow up on my previous complaint regarding the Kreo Mechanical Keyboard purchased via Amazon (Order No. 406-1348651-6081130, dated 5th May 2025). After speaking with your customer care team at ‪‪+91 96115 07877‬‬, I was advised to: 1) Perform a hard reset using the Function + Escape key combination 2) Remove and clean the keycaps to eliminate any dust or debris 3) Open this keyboard tester link and test your keyboard: ‪https://en.key-test.ru/‬ 4) Follow other basic troubleshooting procedures I have carefully followed all these steps as instructed. Previous Issue: Before troubleshooting, the number 4 key was completely unresponsive, and the rest of the number keys (1–0 including backspace key) were very slow to respond—requiring multiple presses (4 to 5 times) to register. Current Status (Post Troubleshooting): The entire number row is now fully responsive but sometime stopped working, except for the number 4 key, which remains completely non-functional. I have also noticed that the LED backlighting for the ‘R’, ‘F’, and ‘C’ keys is not aligned with the rest of the keyboard's lighting pattern. These keys work properly in terms of typing input, but their LEDs appear faded and out of sync with the rest of the keyboard. I kindly request your support in resolving these remaining issues, either through a replacement or any further recommended action under warranty. Thank you for your assistance. Looking forward to your prompt response. Best regards, Jigar Shailesh Chudasama Phone: ‪‪+91 9699545450‬‬ Email: jigarchudasama4@gmail.com

column6:
here is the detailed issue I’m facing with my Kreo Swarn keyboard:

I was using it in wired mode, and when I disconnected it from my laptop, the lights stayed on for some time and then turned off. But when I pressed a key, it turned on again, even though it was not connected to anything.

I left it disconnected for around 5-6 hours, and it was still on when I came back, which is draining the battery.

The input works fine otherwise, and it goes to sleep properly in dongle and Bluetooth mode, but in wired mode, it doesn’t fully turn off.

Recently, it started connecting and disconnecting repeatedly in wired mode while in use.

Now, a new issue: I was out for around 1 day, and when I came back, the keyboard is not turning on in WiFi/Bluetooth mode.

It seems like there is also an issue with the battery not charging properly.

Dear Kreo-tech Support Team,

I am writing to raise a warranty claim for a Harpy mouse that I purchased on 13th July 2025 via Amazon.in (Order Number: 407-7596918-7258712).

The mouse has stopped functioning correctly. While the buttons are working fine, the cursor is not responding or moving at all. I have tried basic troubleshooting steps, including checking the USB port and trying it on a different computer, but the issue persists.

As the product is still under warranty, I kindly request you to initiate the warranty process and advise the next steps for repair or replacement.

Please let me know if you require any further details, including a copy of the invoice or images of the product.
